entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is refereeing the Quidditch match.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that is competing in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that is competing in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: An object used in Quidditch that can hit players and knock them off their brooms.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of the Gryffindor team.
Madam Hooch is refereeing the match between Gryffindor and Slytherin.
Harry was hit by a Bludger.
